title: GOP Marks Dodd-Frank's 4th Birthday With Calls For Repeal
teaser: It's been four years since Dodd-Frank Act was signed into law. On the anniversary of this sweeping overhaul of financial regulations, Republicans have released a report that argues the law falls short on one of its main tasks.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
